name: Asset Management Director
description: Senior executive responsible for overall asset management strategy and portfolio

name: Maintenance Manager
description: Manages overall maintenance operations, budgets, and strategic planning

name: Operations Manager
description: Oversees daily operations and production activities

name: Mine General Manager
description: Senior executive responsible for overall mine operations and strategic management

name: Maintenance Superintendent
description: Senior management role overseeing maintenance departments and strategies

name: Operations Superintendent
description: Senior management role overseeing operations departments and production strategies

name: Reliability Manager
description: Leads reliability initiatives and asset performance optimisation

name: Maintenance Supervisor
description: Supervises daily maintenance activities and technician teams

name: Operations Supervisor
description: Supervises daily operations and production staff

name: Planning Supervisor
description: Supervises planning activities and coordinates planning team operations

name: Shift Supervisor
description: Manages operations and maintenance activities during specific shifts

name: Area Supervisor
description: Supervises activities within a specific plant area or unit

name: Reliability Engineer
description: Analyses equipment performance and develops reliability improvement strategies

name: Maintenance Engineer
description: Provides technical expertise for maintenance planning and problem-solving

name: Process Engineer
description: Optimises manufacturing processes and equipment performance

name: Continuous Improvement Engineer
description: Develops and implements continuous improvement initiatives and process optimisation

name: Mechanical Engineer
description: Specialises in mechanical systems design, analysis, and maintenance

name: Electrical Engineer
description: Handles electrical systems design, maintenance, and troubleshooting

name: Instrumentation Engineer
description: Manages control systems, instrumentation, and automation equipment

name: Maintenance Planner
description: Plans and schedules maintenance activities and resource allocation

name: Planner
description: Develops detailed work plans and resource requirements for maintenance tasks

name: Scheduler
description: Coordinates timing and sequencing of maintenance and operations activities

name: Work Order Coordinator
description: Manages work order processes and coordinates between departments

name: Maintenance Coordinator
description: Coordinates maintenance activities and resources across departments

name: Process Asset Manager
description: Manages process-related assets and optimises asset performance within production processes

name: Continuous Improvement Reviewer
description: Reviews and evaluates continuous improvement initiatives and their effectiveness

name: Maintenance Technician
description: Performs hands-on maintenance, repairs, and preventive maintenance tasks

name: Maintainer
description: General maintenance worker performing various repair and upkeep tasks

name: Mechanic
description: Specialises in mechanical equipment repair and maintenance

name: Electrician
description: Performs electrical installation, maintenance, and repair work

name: Instrumentation Technician
description: Maintains and calibrates control instruments and automation systems

name: Process Operator
description: Operates production equipment and monitors process parameters

name: Equipment Operator
description: Operates specific types of machinery or equipment

name: Operator
description: General equipment operator responsible for running production systems

name: Vibration Analyst
description: Specialises in vibration analysis for predictive maintenance programs

name: Lubrication Specialist
description: Manages lubrication programs and oil analysis activities

name: Predictive Maintenance Technician
description: Performs condition monitoring and predictive maintenance techniques

name: Condition Monitoring Specialist
description: Monitors equipment condition using various diagnostic techniques

name: Thermographer
description: Uses thermal imaging for equipment condition assessment

name: Safety Officer
description: Ensures compliance with safety regulations and promotes safe work practices

name: Environmental Officer
description: Manages environmental compliance and sustainability initiatives

name: Quality Inspector
description: Inspects products and processes to ensure quality standards

name: Training Coordinator
description: Develops and coordinates training programs for operations and maintenance staff

name: Auditor
description: Conducts audits of processes, procedures, and compliance activities

name: Asset Performance Analyst
description: Analyses asset performance data and generates improvement recommendations

name: CMMS Administrator
description: Manages computerised maintenance management systems and data integrity

name: Materials Coordinator
description: Manages spare parts inventory and procurement for maintenance activities

name: Contractor Coordinator
description: Manages external contractors and vendor relationships for maintenance work

name: Shutdown Coordinator
description: Plans and coordinates major maintenance shutdowns and turnarounds

name: Planning and Reliability Superintendent
description: Oversees maintenance planning strategies and reliability programs to optimize asset performance and equipment uptime
